name: cluster_id
description: Unique identifier for cluster

name: taxon_id_X
description: Count of proteins for each taxon_id within cluster (one column per taxon)

name: attribute
description: Name of attribute or grouping

name: taxon_set
description: Taxon ID

name: cluster_total_count
description: Total number of clusters in which proteins of taxon_set were found

name: protein_total_count
description: Total number of proteins of taxon_set

name: protein_total_span
description: Sum of lengths of proteins of taxon_set (0 if no length data)

name: singleton_cluster_count
description: Number of singleton clusters (contain only one protein)

name: singleton_protein_count
description: Number of proteins in singleton clusters (NOT NEEDED)

name: singleton_protein_span
description: Sum of lengths of proteins in singleton clusters

name: specific_cluster_count
description: Number of specific clusters (contain >1 proteins of taxon_set)

name: specific_protein_count
description: Number of proteins in specific clusters

name: specific_protein_span
description: Sum of lengths of proteins in specific clusters

name: shared_cluster_count
description: Number of shared clusters (contain proteins of taxon_set and other taxon_sets)

name: shared_protein_count
description: Number of proteins in shared clusters

name: shared_protein_span
description: Sum of lengths of proteins in shared clusters

name: specific_cluster_true_1to1_count
description: Number of specific clusters where all members of taxon_set have 1:1 orthologues

name: specific_cluster_fuzzy_count
description: Number of specific clusters where all members of taxon_set have fuzzy orthologues

name: shared_cluster_true_1to1_count
description: Number of shared clusters where all members of taxon_set have 1:1 orthologues

name: shared_cluster_fuzzy_count
description: Number of shared clusters where all members of taxon_set have fuzzy orthologues

name: absent_cluster_total_count
description: Number of clusters from which taxon_set members are absent

name: absent_cluster_singleton_count
description: Number of singleton clusters from which taxon_set members are absent

name: absent_cluster_specific_count
description: Number of specific clusters from which taxon_set members are absent

name: absent_cluster_shared_count
description: Number of shared clusters from which taxon_set members are absent

name: TAXON_count
description: Number of taxon_ids in taxon_set

name: TAXON_taxa
description: Names of taxon_ids in taxon_set
